page.title: 02TRADE
page.content: {LEGORSEWHEAL }Boarding kennels are situated at Wheal Rose,near Scorrier.The kennels are run by Mrs.Kirby and Mrs.Carter. They have both been at the kennels for 25 years and Mrs.Kirby has been breeding Cavalier King Charles Spaniels for 50 years. Mrs.Carter let out two Alsastian dogs called Jake and Mac,Mac is the father of 4 puppies we saw. They feed the dogs on tripe that they get from a supplier,in addition to traditional tinned dog food. Most people put their pets in the kennels because they are on holiday,at work or in hospital. Here are the charges Per day. {DOGS:Small Â£2.30 inc.V.A.T. {Medium Â£2.75 inc.V.A.T. {Large Â£3.25 inc.V.A.T. {CATS: Â£1.25 inc.V.A.T. All together they have about 95 pets.
